lead_paragraph: President Obama inherited two wars from his predecessor, and has struggled to wind them down. American troops are still in both Iraq and Afghanistan.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Combat Missions May Have Ended, but Not the Fighting
headline.main: U.S. Combat Missions May End, but Fighting Goes On
